name: Moody Metro
description:
A prototype I've been working on and hope to develop and release fully. Focused on an arcade driving style and a stat-based part system to upgrade cars. Taking inspiration from some of the first open-world racers such as Need for Speed Underground 2 and Midnight Club 3.

Currently, there's a small map, with two events started by two parked cars. You can drive up to an NPC and start a time-trial event(Enter or X Button). If you beat a set time you will be rewarded parts that upgrade your car.

There's also a garage where you can swap to a different car and purchase basic upgrades.

Keep in mind this a prototype and very early in development. There's bugs, glitches, things aren't complete. That said feedback is important and I'll take note of anything I receive. More Updates Coming Soon
